verses.verse: כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all זֶ֞ה <WH2088> this נָתַ֤תִּי <WH5414> For all this I considered אֶל־ <WH413> to לִבִּי֙ <WH3820> in my heart וְלָב֣וּר <WH952> even to declare אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> anything זֶ֔ה <WH2088> this אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> it הַצַּדִּיקִ֧ים <WH6662> all this that the righteous וְהַחֲכָמִ֛ים <WH2450> and the wise וַעֲבָדֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5652> and their works בְּיַ֣ד <WH3027> [are] in the hand הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God גַּֽם־ <WH1571> either אַהֲבָ֣ה <WH160> love גַם־ <WH1571> or שִׂנְאָ֗ה <WH8135> or hatred אֵ֤ין <WH369> does not יוֹדֵ֙עַ֙ <WH3045> knoweth הָֽאָדָ֔ם <WH120> no man הַכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> anything לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6440> [by] all [that is] before

הַכֹּ֞ל <WH3605> for all כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> and to him that לַכֹּ֗ל <WH3605> for all מִקְרֶ֨ה <WH4745> event אֶחָ֜ד <WH259> All [things come] alike to all [there is] one לַצַּדִּ֤יק <WH6662> to the righteous וְלָרָשָׁע֙ <WH7563> and to the wicked לַטּוֹב֙ <WH2896> to the good וְלַטָּה֣וֹר <WH2889> and to the clean וְלַטָּמֵ֔א <WH2931> and to the unclean וְלַזֹּבֵ֔חַ <WH2076> to him that sacrificeth וְלַאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> who אֵינֶ֣נּוּ <WH369> else זֹבֵ֑חַ <WH2076> sacrificeth כַּטּוֹב֙ <WH2896> not as [is] the good כַּֽחֹטֶ֔א <WH2398> so [is] the sinner הַנִּשְׁבָּ֕ע <WH7650> [and] he that sweareth כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> who שְׁבוּעָ֥ה <WH7621> an oath יָרֵֽא׃ <WH3372> is afraid

זֶ֣ה ׀ <WH2088> This רָ֗ע <WH7451> This [is] an evil בְּכֹ֤ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> is נַעֲשָׂה֙ <WH6213> among all [things] that are done תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> under הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <WH8121> under the sun כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מִקְרֶ֥ה <WH4745> event אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> that [there is] one לַכֹּ֑ל <WH3605> for all וְגַ֣ם <WH1571> Furthermore לֵ֣ב <WH3820> unto all yea also the heart בְּֽנֵי־ <WH1121> of the sons הָ֠אָדָם <WH120> of men מָלֵא־ <WH4390> is full רָ֨ע <WH7451> of evil וְהוֹלֵל֤וֹת <WH1947> and madness בִּלְבָבָם֙ <WH3824> [is] in their heart בְּחַיֵּיהֶ֔ם <WH2416> while they live וְאַחֲרָ֖יו <WH310> and after אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֵּתִֽים׃ <WH4191> that [they go] to the dead

כִּי־ <WH3588> surely מִי֙ <WH4310> For אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after [יִבָּחֵר כ] (יְחֻבַּ֔ר <WH977> acceptable ק) אֶ֥ל <WH413> with כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַחַיִּ֖ים <WH2416> to all the living יֵ֣שׁ <WH3426> to him that is בִּטָּח֑וֹן <WH986> there is hope כִּֽי־ <WH3588> surely לְכֶ֤לֶב <WH3611> dog חַי֙ <WH2416> for a living ה֣וּא <WH1931> he ט֔וֹב <WH2896> is better מִן־ <WH4480> than הָאַרְיֵ֖ה <WH738> lion הַמֵּֽת׃ <WH4191> than a dead

כִּ֧י <WH3588> For הַֽחַיִּ֛ים <WH2416> For the living יוֹדְעִ֖ים <WH3045> know שֶׁיָּמֻ֑תוּ <WH4191> that they shall die וְהַמֵּתִ֞ים <WH4191> but the dead אֵינָ֧ם <WH369> nor יוֹדְעִ֣ים <WH3045> know מְא֗וּמָה <WH3972> not any thing וְאֵֽין־ <WH369> have ע֤וֹד <WH5750> any לָהֶם֙ שָׂכָ֔ר <WH7939> neither have they any more a reward כִּ֥י <WH3588> for נִשְׁכַּ֖ח <WH7911> of them is forgotten זִכְרָֽם׃ <WH2143> for the memory

גַּ֣ם <WH1571> Indeed אַהֲבָתָ֧ם <WH160> Also their love גַּם־ <WH1571> Indeed שִׂנְאָתָ֛ם <WH8135> and their hatred גַּם־ <WH1571> Indeed קִנְאָתָ֖ם <WH7068> and their envy כְּבָ֣ר <WH3528> is now אָבָ֑דָה <WH6> perished וְחֵ֨לֶק <WH2506> neither have they any more a portion אֵין־ <WH369> will no לָהֶ֥ם <WH1992> like עוֹד֙ <WH5750> longer לְעוֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> for ever בְּכֹ֥ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> is נַעֲשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> in any [thing] that is done תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> under הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <WH8121> under the sun

לֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> Go אֱכֹ֤ל <WH398> eat בְּשִׂמְחָה֙ <WH8057> with joy לַחְמֶ֔ךָ <WH3899> thy bread וּֽשֲׁתֵ֥ה <WH8354> and drink בְלֶב־ <WH3820> heart ט֖וֹב <WH2896> with a merry יֵינֶ֑ךָ <WH3196> thy wine כִּ֣י <WH3588> for כְבָ֔ר <WH3528> now רָצָ֥ה <WH7521> accepteth הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> for God אֶֽת־ <WH854> for מַעֲשֶֽׂיךָ׃ <WH4639> thy works

בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all עֵ֕ת <WH6256> be always יִהְי֥וּ <WH1961> Let בְגָדֶ֖יךָ <WH899> Let thy garments לְבָנִ֑ים <WH3836> white וְשֶׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> no ointment עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹאשְׁךָ֥ <WH7218> and let thy head אַל־ <WH408> nay יֶחְסָֽר׃ <WH2637> lack

רְאֵ֨ה <WH7200> joyfully חַיִּ֜ים <WH2416> Live עִם־ <WH5973> with אִשָּׁ֣ה <WH802> with the wife אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom אָהַ֗בְתָּ <WH157> whom thou lovest כָּל־ <WH3605> all יְמֵי֙ <WH3117> all the days חַיֵּ֣י <WH2416> of the life הֶבְלֶ֔ךָ <WH1892> of thy vanity אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which נָֽתַן־ <WH5414> which he hath given לְךָ֙ תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> under הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <WH8121> thee under the sun כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> all the days הֶבְלֶ֑ךָ <WH1892> of thy vanity כִּ֣י <WH3588> for ה֤וּא <WH1931> this חֶלְקְךָ֙ <WH2506> for that [is] thy portion בַּֽחַיִּ֔ים <WH2416> in [this] life וּבַעֲמָ֣לְךָ֔ <WH5999> and in thy labour אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you עָמֵ֖ל <WH6001> which thou takest תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> under הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <WH8121> under the sun

כֹּ֠ל <WH3605> all manner אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after תִּמְצָ֧א <WH4672> findeth יָֽדְךָ֛ <WH3027> Whatsoever thy hand לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> to do בְּכֹחֲךָ֖ <WH3581> [it] with thy might עֲשֵׂ֑ה <WH6213> do כִּי֩ <WH3588> for אֵ֨ין <WH369> there מַעֲשֶׂ֤ה <WH4639> for [there is] no work וְחֶשְׁבּוֹן֙ <WH2808> nor device וְדַ֣עַת <WH1847> nor knowledge וְחָכְמָ֔ה <WH2451> nor wisdom בִּשְׁא֕וֹל <WH7585> in the grave אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you הֹלֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> whither thou goest שָֽׁמָּה׃ <WH8033> in it ס

שַׁ֜בְתִּי <WH7725> I returned וְרָאֹ֣ה <WH7200> and saw תַֽחַת־ <WH8478> under הַשֶּׁ֗מֶשׁ <WH8121> under the sun כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹא֩ <WH3808> is not לַקַּלִּ֨ים <WH7031> [is] not to the swift הַמֵּר֜וֹץ <WH4793> that the race וְלֹ֧א <WH3808> is not לַגִּבּוֹרִ֣ים <WH1368> to the strong הַמִּלְחָמָ֗ה <WH4421> nor the battle וְ֠גַם <WH1571> again לֹ֣א <WH3808> not לַחֲכָמִ֥ים <WH2450> to the wise לֶ֙חֶם֙ <WH3899> neither yet bread וְגַ֨ם <WH1571> again לֹ֤א <WH3808> not לַנְּבֹנִים֙ <WH995> to men of understanding עֹ֔שֶׁר <WH6239> nor yet riches וְגַ֛ם <WH1571> again לֹ֥א <WH3808> not לַיֹּדְעִ֖ים <WH3045> to men of skill חֵ֑ן <WH2580> nor yet favour כִּי־ <WH3588> for עֵ֥ת <WH6256> but time וָפֶ֖גַע <WH6294> and chance יִקְרֶ֥ה <WH7136> happeneth אֶת־ <WH853> כֻּלָּֽם׃ <WH3605> all

כִּ֡י <WH3588> for גַּם֩ <WH1571> again לֹֽא־ <WH3808> does not יֵדַ֨ע <WH3045> also knoweth הָאָדָ֜ם <WH120> For man אֶת־ <WH853> עִתּ֗וֹ <WH6256> not his time כַּדָּגִים֙ <WH1709> as the fishes שֶׁנֶּֽאֱחָזִים֙ <WH270> that are taken בִּמְצוֹדָ֣ה <WH4686> castle רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> in an evil וְכַ֨צִּפֳּרִ֔ים <WH6833> and as the birds הָאֲחֻז֖וֹת <WH270> that are caught בַּפָּ֑ח <WH6341> in the snare כָּהֵ֗ם <WH1992> so יֽוּקָשִׁים֙ <WH3369> snared בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> [are] the sons הָֽאָדָ֔ם <WH120> of men לְעֵ֣ת <WH6256> time רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> in an evil כְּשֶׁתִּפּ֥וֹל <WH5307> when it falleth עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> and פִּתְאֹֽם׃ <WH6597> suddenly

גַּם־ <WH1571> Also זֹ֛ה <WH2090> This רָאִ֥יתִי <WH7200> have I seen חָכְמָ֖ה <WH2451> wisdom תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> under הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <WH8121> also under the sun וּגְדוֹלָ֥ה <WH1419> and it [seemed] great הִ֖יא <WH1931> he אֵלָֽי׃ <WH413> about

עִ֣יר <WH5892> city קְטַנָּ֔ה <WH6996> [There was] a little וַאֲנָשִׁ֥ים <WH582> men בָּ֖הּ מְעָ֑ט <WH4592> and few וּבָֽא־ <WH935> within it and there came אֵלֶ֜יהָ <WH413> about מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> king גָּדוֹל֙ <WH1419> a great וְסָבַ֣ב <WH5437> against it and besieged אֹתָ֔הּ <WH853> וּבָנָ֥ה <WH1129> it and built עָלֶ֖יהָ <WH5921> against מְצוֹדִ֥ים <WH4685> bulwarks גְּדֹלִֽים׃ <WH1419> great

וּמָ֣צָא <WH4672> Now there was found בָ֗הּ אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> man מִסְכֵּן֙ <WH4542> in it a poor חָכָ֔ם <WH2450> wise וּמִלַּט־ <WH4422> delivered ה֥וּא <WH1931> he אֶת־ <WH853> הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> the city בְּחָכְמָת֑וֹ <WH2451> and he by his wisdom וְאָדָם֙ <WH120> yet no man לֹ֣א <WH3808> no זָכַ֔ר <WH2142> remembered אֶת־ <WH853> הָאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> man הַמִּסְכֵּ֖ן <WH4542> that same poor הַהֽוּא׃ <WH1931> I

וְאָמַ֣רְתִּי <WH559> Then said אָ֔נִי <WH589> I טוֹבָ֥ה <WH2896> [is] better חָכְמָ֖ה <WH2451> I Wisdom מִגְּבוּרָ֑ה <WH1369> than strength וְחָכְמַ֤ת <WH2451> wisdom הַמִּסְכֵּן֙ <WH4542> nevertheless the poor man's בְּזוּיָ֔ה <WH959> [is] despised וּדְבָרָ֖יו <WH1697> and his words אֵינָ֥ם <WH369> are not נִשְׁמָעִֽים׃ <WH8085> are not heard

דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> The words חֲכָמִ֔ים <WH2450> of wise בְּנַ֖חַת <WH5183> in quiet נִשְׁמָעִ֑ים <WH8085> [men are] heard מִזַּעֲקַ֥ת <WH2201> more than the cry מוֹשֵׁ֖ל <WH4910> of him that ruleth בַּכְּסִילִֽים׃ <WH3684> among fools

טוֹבָ֥ה <WH2896> [is] better חָכְמָ֖ה <WH2451> Wisdom מִכְּלֵ֣י <WH3627> than weapons קְרָ֑ב <WH7128> of war וְחוֹטֶ֣א <WH2398> sinner אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> but one יְאַבֵּ֥ד <WH6> destroyeth טוֹבָ֥ה <WH2896> good הַרְבֵּֽה׃ <WH7235> much
